Text: Any one more but me that got up that the VIDEO_TS is corrupt?

Just in case any of you haven´t found it out yet, it seems the DVD files have some sort of protection, and the standard burners (NERO etc), won´t burn them correctly.

Burn it to DVD using a software such as Magic DVD Copier or something like that. Then it´ll go smoothly.
all you have to do it change the format with an program like FLV to AVI MPEG WMV 3GP MP4 iPod Converter or Total Video Converter. then it should read ok
